overview: On an island lost between two worlds, Dai, a young Chinese woman, survives alone in a cave, waiting for the baby that swells her womb day after day. Around the harbour which, every day, flurry with the arrival of hundreds of migrants, she searches tirelessly the face of the man she loves, her husband. One, night her wish is to be fulfilled
tagline: A story made of dreams without fairies, in the midst of a contemporary world, where individuals must reinvent themselves
title: Isola
